title: Jaime Harrison
description: Samantha Bee sits down with DNC Chair Jaime Harrison to discuss the plan for the--gulp--2022 midterms, how to build on Joe Biden's early success, and how to turn off politics when it's your whole life.
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
